content.raw:
Thank you for the contribution! 

I have a few comments, mostly related to style. To make your life easier, I'm preparing a pull request to your repository against this branch with style fixes. Before that, could you please merge this [pull request](https://bitbucket.org/peci1/gazebo/pull-requests/1/merge-from-osrf-gazebo-default-branch) to sync this branch with default? Right now it is hundreds of commits behind.

Thanks!

I have a few comments, mostly related to style. To make your life easier, I'm preparing a pull request to your repository against this branch with style fixes. Before that, could you please merge this pull request to sync this branch with default? Right now it is hundreds of commits behind.

Thanks!
